title: The Madness
content: Thinking of his father he looks toward the walled village where a pretty girl carries the last of the winter sweetroot. A gust of warm seasonal wind washes through her light brown hair, and a moment later his own. He shakes his limbs dry and wipes his head.

title: The Village

scenes.heading: village life
scenes.short: What's it like to live in this village?
